name: H Y D R O G E D D O N
author: Knocks
notes: Got to KoG with this pretty standard dino/electro deck. Only been playing for a month so it's missing some cards I'd love to add (Fossil Dig/Chalice/another Floodgate). Initially had 2x Metalmorph instead of SRH but found SRH more useful, and had 2x XZH as well but vs most decks in Legend it felt like a dead draw.
